Used to work internationally with different cultures and highly motivated in selling and delivering telecom products and solutions to various mobile operators worldwide. Very result oriented with proven record of providing the committed sales turnover. Highly accountable and customer orientated with an excellent commercial awareness. 

Sales integrity and sound customer follow-up maximizes profits and customer retention. Have developed extensive sales experience and expertise in working with different cultures and people of varied fields in providing the customized solutions and products.

Able to use own initiative and work as part of an international team. 
Proven skills, including managing and motivating the account team and other staff to achieve the committed targets and company objectives. 
An effective communicator at all levels within an organization. Good problem solving and analytical skills.


Specialties

Account Management, (Partner/Channel) Sales, Customer Support Services, Business Development, Product Management, Team Management. Performing Energy Scans, offering Renewable Energy Concepts and Solar Energy Solutions.

profile_positions.description:
ENERGY PERFORMANCE ADVISOR EP-W/U

As an independent EP-W/U Advisor, carrying out a professional and adequate inspection of residential units and  business premises and buildings to calculate and determine the energy performance of the buildings. The energy performance calculation includes all the important and required building parts, such as the technical installations (heating, cooling, ventilation), floors, roof, building lighting, windows and the insulations. The inspection results are processed in a special software which determines the Energy Performance (Energy Lable) of the building. After calculating and determining the energy performance of the building, an dedicated and customized improvement advice/report will be provided to  the property owners in order to improve the energy performance of building and make the building more sustainable in an best efficient manner, creating and maintaining a safe and sustainable life environment.
profile_positions.title: Energy Performance Advisor EP-W/U
